prTitle: feat: implement CarCard component and CatalogPage
prBody:
## Summary

- **`src/hooks/useCarCatalog.ts`** — New hook mirroring the `useDrinks` pattern. Fetches `ferrari.json` and `lamborghini.json` from `public/data/` in parallel, maps the JSON `image` field to `imageUrl` on `CarModel`, and returns chronologically sorted `ferrariCars` / `lamboCars` arrays with optional `decade` and `search` filtering. Supports abort on unmount.
- **`src/components/CarCard.tsx`** — Top-trump-style card component displaying car image (lazy), model name, year, decade badge, and all five numeric specs (HP, torque, 0–60, top speed, engine config). Applies `ferrari-red` / `lambo-yellow` Tailwind tokens for borders, badges, and buttons. Includes `aria-pressed` and `data-selected` for accessibility.
- **`src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx`** — Catalog page consuming `useCarCatalog`, rendering two brand sections (Ferrari & Lamborghini) with responsive `CarCard` grids, loading spinner, and error alert.
- **`src/App.tsx`** — `/catalog` route wired alongside existing routes (`/`, `/ferrari`, `/lamborghini`, `/compare`).
- **`docs/components.md`** — Updated with `CarCard`, `CatalogPage`, and `useCarCatalog` documentation sections.

All 151 tests pass.

Closes #71
